name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a highly skilled Senior Java Engineer with over 8 years in software engineering, I specialize in developing robust and scalable applications utilizing **Java**, **Eclipse**, **IntelliJ**, and database technologies such as **Oracle** and **Postgres**. My competencies also extend to frontend development with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, ensuring a seamless user experience. I am proficient in version control with **Git** and have a strong foundational knowledge of frameworks like **Angular**. With a proven track record of delivering high-quality code, I am dedicated to implementing effective and efficient solutions that drive business success while adhering to industry standards.
